name: Platman
overview: Straightforward and easy platformer, featuring that ever-popular video game character Pacman. Simply collect items for points, jump the spikes/water, dodge/kill the ghosts, and open the locks with keys to progress. Created in 2016 by Andrea Schincaglia and Saul Cross as part of the RGCD C64 16KB Cartridge Game Development Competition 2015/2016. A commercial sequel Platman Worlds was released in 2017.
